pullRequest.title: OKAPI-868 Add timer to capture metrics of top slow methods
pullRequest.bodyText:
PTF performance test results provided a list of slow methods in Okapi. This PR adds timer around those code blocks so the metrics can be captured. Please see https://issues.folio.org/browse/OKAPI-868.
The captured metrics in InfluxDB looks like this
name: org_folio_okapi_code_executionTime
time                     count host          mean      metric_type name                              sum       upper
----                     ----- ----          ----      ----------- ----                              ---       -----
2020-10-09T02:59:08.966Z 0     92.242.140.21 0         histogram   ProxyService.match                0         1.109325
2020-10-09T02:59:08.979Z 0     92.242.140.21 0         histogram   ProxyContext.logResponse          0         0.698525
2020-10-09T02:59:08.985Z 0     92.242.140.21 0         histogram   ProxyContext.logRequest           0         0.580667
2020-10-09T02:59:08.986Z 0     92.242.140.21 0         histogram   ProxyService.getModulesForRequest 0         21.003217
2020-10-09T02:59:08.986Z 3     92.242.140.21 5.290524  histogram   LockedTypedMap1.get.decodeValue   15.871572 11.978

commit.message: Add metrics for some slow methods
Add metrics for one more decode call

nodes.bodyText:
This is the slowest method reported in OKAPI-868.
Can you put in more granular metrics? For example

ProxyService.getModulesForRequest for enabledModules
ProxyService.getModulesForRequest for rr 1
ProxyService.getModulesForRequest for rr 2
ProxyService.getModulesForRequest sort
ProxyService.getModulesForRequest for mods
